data.text: @andreavolpato_ Dear Andrea, we are sorry to hear about your experience. Would you be so kind to send us via DM your booking details? We'd like to do some checks on what you have reported to us. Thank you

@FDTAddict We thank you for bringing this to our attention. We always strive to make our passengers' journey as pleasant as possible, so any remark is welcome and will be forwarded internally. Have a nice day ahead

Sweden is now closer than you think! 🛫
Discover its beauty from Frankfurt, flying to Ronneby or Kalmar until 12 December inclusive.
Take advantage of a 20% discount on some dedicated sales classes 😎
More details via DM or by contacting our Sales Center: https://t.co/zaeYYKzrMO https://t.co/MYlsycR12s
@volandocanarias They are really well organised! 😊

@micmol Hey Michele 😎 our destination map will be updated very soon. The landing pages for these great new #Ronneby #Kalmar destinations are already available: https://t.co/VDhT5aAEzR

data.text:
Did you know there's a whole world behind the seat that you sit on as your pilot whisks you away on your next adventure? Aerospace engineer Maddalena could tell you where every last screw is!
💙 https://t.co/xzCkc5J9cR
#FlyingHighSince1991 https://t.co/fGfMFRVtDs
@jwskooz Hello Justin, thanks for your DM. We are very glad that your baggage is with you now, and we apologize once again for the incovenience. Best regards // SocialMediaTeam

The south of Sweden offers a marvelous blend of forests 🌲 and idyllic historical sites. Starting from today, you can now enjoy it to the fullest thanks to our direct flights ✈️ from Frankfurt to the airports of Kalmar & Ronneby! 
#Ronnebyairport @Visit_Blekinge #Kalmar #AdAstra https://t.co/jy9tduSVUZ

We are pleased to introduce you to the new Air Dolomiti's CEO, Steffen Harbarth!
Welcome aboard! ✈️

#AdAstra #AirDolomiti #WeAreAirDolomiti https://t.co/X72cBccsro
@jwskooz Hi Justin, we are sorry to read this and of course we can help you, could you please send us your reference number via private message?

data.text: For outdoor enthusiasts, the surroundings of Aarhus 🌄 offer a wealth of choices for hikers. Here’s the second part of our mini guide to the small Danish city on the #AirDolomitiBlog 👉 https://t.co/RMDv7uHtCe https://t.co/4PIuhgRIEu
@MUC_Airport There’s no better way to celebrate our 30th anniversary throughout 2021 than with the reopening of the Munich-Turin route 😊 Thank you for your warm wishes!

Who can honestly say, hand on heart, that they wake up in the morning happy to go to work? Let's find out if Alessandra is a rare as she thinks she is!
💙 https://t.co/G7X9pjCdg4

#FlyingHighSince1991 https://t.co/VQ37wV24Qn

Have you ever wondered where the air we breathe on board an aircraft comes from? 🌬️ It requires very sophisticated equipment, but how does it work exactly? Find out on the #AirDolomitiBlog ☁️ https://t.co/D7EJ4MnpJZ https://t.co/f03jS5JkDS

Hey, 30th September is coming up ⏰ and you can still get extra miles on all our flights! 🎉 
Register now to Flytime 2021 and don’t forget to quote your Miles & More service card number when booking 📲 
Find out more on 👉 https://t.co/mAzv2rxcMQ https://t.co/gZ2daCWG2j
@380_Lover Hi Juergen! :) Thank you so much!! we are all really proud about this big step!!! :)

Reschedule your trip in no time! 📲
Visit our rebooking section and find out how to change your booking.

Go to: https://t.co/6Dk020jEwL  ✈️ https://t.co/i6Jsqz2PlZ

🍃 Air Dolomiti is the first Italian passenger airline to obtain EMAS - Eco-Management and Audit Scheme registration ✔️
In order to inform passengers about the environmental actions implemented, you can now download 📲 the environmental declaration on board 🌎 https://t.co/pWlnbuDJHk

data.text:
Have you ever dreamt about flying? If so... What do dreams about flying mean according to Psychology experts? 💁 
You can find the answer and even tell us about your dream on the #AirDolomitiBlog 👉 https://t.co/dfkyyr78k4 https://t.co/TvQDw8rMfV

@WillSut314 Dear Will, we are sorry to hear about the loss of your wife's luggage. Please send us a DM specifying your PIR (Property Irregularity Report) reported on the document issued at Lost&Found. We are here to assist you, thank you.
@byPinaRusso Hello Pina, if there's anything we can do, please send us a DM with your booking code/ticket number and we'll be glad to assist you. Thank you.

@ultra_Lauren Hi Lauren! 😊 you can get in contact with by phone at +39 0452886140 // Mon-Fri 0830am-8pm or Sat-Sun 09am-5pm (local time). Otherwise, try our free chat service available on our home page 👉 https://t.co/eUsJnOVDRP

💙 https://t.co/o6z03MOqgo

#FlyingHighSince1991 https://t.co/lA4QeU7Ew8

@SheldonvdLinde Dear Sheldon, we're sorry to hear about your flight cancellation and we apologize for any incovenience caused. If you want to send us a feedback about your flight experience, please write us a DM and we'll redirect you to the dept. in charge, thank you.

Our favourite shade: blue! 💙

😍 How beautiful is this shot of our Embraer?

#WeAreAirDolomiti #AdAstra https://t.co/Fb5SePLKQS
@MarcosProlo Thank you! We are so glad to have given you a pleasant flying experience 😍 Looking forward to welcoming you back on board 🛫

If you could click your fingers and get a private jet... What would you want on board? 😎 
Today’s #AirDolomitiBlog looks at what some people have chosen! Private jets and their interiors 👉 https://t.co/Hsc16rfT9k https://t.co/24Jphr6As1

A bridge that goes nowhere? 🤔 The "Infinite Bridge" just outside #Aarhus, Denmark, is worth a day trip - and a selfie! Discover more here 👉 https://t.co/GpT3w4rCwr

data.text:
Happy #internationalfriendshipday 👬
Daniele and Tommaso, they share the same passion: aviation ✈️ and they are both football fans too!
They met inside Air Dolomiti's flight deck but their friendship has also grown outside work. Do you have a colleague "buddy"? Tell us more! 😊 https://t.co/gXKD3jrLl5

Happy #internationalfriendshipday 👭👬
Milena and Cristina met in Air Dolomiti in 2013.
They are proof of how a lasting friendship (and many aperitifs 🍹) can emerge and blossom in a work environment.

Tag your aperitif colleague and tell us your story 😊
 #WeAreAirDolomiti https://t.co/9rXEccS0gF

data.text:
Very few people can claim to have seen our planet from space, but we've got some spectacular images taken by drones! The third part of our story on aerial photography on the #AirDolomitiBlog 📸
👉 https://t.co/jOJwHkWSr9 https://t.co/kwTMYuNWqG

Put your explorer mode on and visit the #GrottadiBossea caves, not far from #Cuneo.
You will see underground streams and lakes, stalactites and stalagmites... Be sure to book your ticket! 
👉 https://t.co/j8NPq8SUVZ

In collaboration with @AtlCuneese
Ph.: R. Croci https://t.co/5xnH5xZT0L

Who was Louis Blériot and how did he manage to fly the distance from France to England over a century ago? Today on the #AirDolomitiBlog, we tell you his story.
Learn more 👉 https://t.co/DoLjVZK6Xw https://t.co/AYQCLiwG1b

“Somewhere over the rainbow
Bluebirds fly
And the dreams that you dream of
Dreams really do come true”
🌈🌈🌈
Flying to Frankfurt! Thanks to our crew for this shot 😍

#WeAreAirDolomiti #AdAstra https://t.co/oEsVtsfhiC
All Air Dolomiti planes have a HEPA filter on board, considerably improving the air you breathe during your flight, purifying it and making your journey safer.  ✈️ https://t.co/XAQbBBD6O5

Now is the perfect time to visit Aarhus, also known as the City of Smiles and Europe's second happiest city. Ready to go? On the #AirDolomitiBlog
👉 https://t.co/Z4A8M27kI8 https://t.co/HGK2JWuXCD

From the thrill of seeing passengers experience their first ever flight to being proud of Air Dolomiti's desire to set itself apart, there's never a dull day in Andrea's job.
💙 https://t.co/sAQxNuEnD3

#FlyingHighSince1991 https://t.co/dJovPQ6YSY

Goddag, Denmark! 🇩🇰
Let's set off to discover the city of everyday wonder: from today we fly you to Aarhus! 😍

Special thanks to @AARairport for this warm welcome!

@VisitAarhus #visitDenmark #Aarhus #AdAstra #AirDolomiti #LookingForwardToTheWorld #SettimoCielo https://t.co/GsWzXciszz
@MUC_Airport Yayyy 🎉🛫

How much work goes into aeroplane safety? We'll tell you all about it (with huge admiration for the delicate task of our pilots and technical staff) on the #AirDolomitiBlog
👉 https://t.co/8cM3Ycrfr3 https://t.co/ICauX46nhR

It only takes a few simple habits to turn a trip from stressful to relaxing. Once you’ve discovered them on our website, you won’t be able to live without them! https://t.co/hS2yjDNw4L ✈️ https://t.co/BDtckVPdNJ
@AARairport So glad to cooperate with you! ✈️🎉

Did you know that #Denmark's second city #Aarhus is also known as "The City of Smiles"? 😊 Discover more about Aarhus here 👉 https://t.co/GpT3w4rCwr

📸 Robin Skjoldborg https://t.co/ea3QLHveCJ

👉https://t.co/drjBX4ck49 https://t.co/z9Kv6xBEMl

All details under 👉 https://t.co/Dx9GlZcZiO

#AdAstra #SettimoCielo #AirDolomiti #LookingForwardToTheWorld https://t.co/9LzgCdRZdf

Our aircraft says “hello” to both Frankfurt and Linz for this new Air Dolomiti connection!

#AdAstra #SettimoCielo #AirDolomiti #LookingForwardToTheWorld https://t.co/IPL4pURUd8

What items mustn’t you forget on your way out the door? Documents, luggage and self-declaration. A self-declaration is compulsory in order to best protect you and all passengers flying with Air Dolomiti. For more information, see: https://t.co/uXcXf4Ja8R https://t.co/g7oZxx1Yrs
@dusairport Thank you! Let's fly together 😉✈️

We assure you that you will not be disappointed, because #Verona is a city that deserves a place on your bucket list 🚩

😍 @dusairport & Aeroporto di Verona

#AdAstra #SettimoCielo #AirDolomiti #LookingForwardToTheWorld https://t.co/Y9QuG8oSsk
@toscanaeroporti 🎒✈️⛱️📷 😍

data.text:
"One door closes and a plane door opens", isn't that how the saying goes? Let's not pretend: the average #AvGeek is better at science than witty banter... Today on the #AirDolomitiBlog, we're looking at aircraft hold doors.
👉 https://t.co/lQFfg3cvKb https://t.co/y93ppjwBC4
@AeroportoPa @EleonoraMangano ci potresti inviare un DM? Ci piacerebbe poter utilizzare la tua foto in futuro 😊
@AeroportoPa Cielo azzurro, sole, Palermo ed il nostro aeromobile: una foto perfetta 😍 grazie!

Originality, innovation, internationality, colour and a smile: just some of the things Marian has brought to Air Dolomiti over the past 20 years.
💙 https://t.co/MGf2DXgWsV

#FlyingHighSince1991 https://t.co/9To2lde0kq
@tiiimmmooooo Lieber Timo, diese Aktivität wurde wegen der Pandemie ausgesetzt. Wir hoffen, bald alle Flugzeuge mit der neuen Livery zu haben 😊

Ever got that feeling of Déjá-vu? 
That's right, from today we have resumed our operations from Munich to Forlì and this is the warm welcome they reserved for us! 😄
Info 👉 https://t.co/Im42EUUWHv

#AdAstra #SettimoCielo #AirDolomiti #ForlìAirport #LookingForwardToTheWorld https://t.co/KUUQ5ZBO1m
@AlbertoCunaccia Grande Alberto!!!! ti aspettiamo!! :)

We're back 😉
If you're looking for your next city to visit, you can now discover Verona from Berlin! 
@berlinairport 💙
#AdAstra #SettimoCielo #AirDolomiti #LookingForwardToTheWorld

data.text:
#Cuneo might be less known, nonetheless it's a city with its very unique treasures. 
Did you know that the Royal Castle of Racconigi is an UNESCO World Heritage Site?
👉 https://t.co/FiD5kZt7eQ

In collaboration with @AtlCuneese
Ph. Credits: Roberto Croci https://t.co/bNQI2remFF
@AARairport We are ready too and super excited! ✈️😍

We are pleased to announce the new operations departing from Berlin and Düsseldorf to Verona, starting from June 19th.

All details under https://t.co/padZnYzaWK https://t.co/BVY04wXyBH

Your eyes do not deceive you! Amalia Ercoli-Finzi is an aerospace engineer, scientist, researcher, pioneer and mother of five children; a true force of nature. You can read her story today on the #AirDolomitiBlog
👉 https://t.co/ULHQwum3Rd https://t.co/lTqO8LzRLL

@fs_fra We confirm that our SEN passengers can access the Lounges according to this policy:https://t.co/oBArVxqtYm
Should you experience any difficulties in the future, please let us know as soon as possible so that we can better assist you.
@fs_fra Sure, the access policy for M&M Senators remains unchanged as soon as the Lounge is reopened.

@fs_fra Thank you for your trust.
No reopening date has yet been announced for the TRN lounge, so please monitor the official page: https://t.co/tA7wuufhZS
@CristofoRE22 Good morning Cristoforo! :)

@fs_fra We are really sorry to read and see that you had a bad experience and totally understand your point.
Thank you for reporting this, we already forwarded your case to the department in charge.

data.text:
‘Air Dolomiti changed my life. One day I helped a grumpy passenger on the way back from a trip to Canada. He had a tight connection and was worried about his luggage. Today, that passenger is my husband and my daughters’ dad.’ Full story
 👉 https://t.co/fSM115VOWV https://t.co/HZ5301lKff
@CristofoRE22 So strong and so beautiful! 😍😍

Verona is not only the city of love... Verona is so much more! 💙
🍽️ good food
👙 just enjoying the sun on Lake Garda 
🚲 for active holidaymakers 

Now also directly from #Berlin and #Düsseldorf! ✈️

👉 https://t.co/AfbJjToSkD https://t.co/euOnSSB7qI

👉 https://t.co/Pi8GiNhkyI https://t.co/vffVC3iy9r

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: Did you know that you can have a quick test before flying? The COVID-19 swab test simplifies all entry and exit procedures to and from Italy. Go to the last section to visit all the relevant airport websites: https://t.co/GlDfryrOxm https://t.co/DdNaEKTZJZ
@MUC_Airport Thank you for your the amazing welcome! 😍😍

Fresh water for a fresh start! ☀️
With this welcome water arch, the new Milan Linate-Munich route receives its “air baptism” in the Bavarian capital. Embraer, strike a pose! 📷
Two glamorous cities, two countries and almost exactly 1h apart.
✈️ @MUC_Airport 
#AdAstra #AirDolomiti https://t.co/j5WisqdWrX

The years go by, as do the passengers who board Air Dolomiti flights every day. In 30 years, we’ve seen more than 27 million travellers pass by. Our goal? To welcome just as many in the coming years. 💙
#FlyingHighSince1991 https://t.co/zdL5xRM9ZM

@AgueraMartin It looks like a morning greeting 🦅✈️
Thank you Martin!
